query:
SELECT 
  'creativeWorks' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM creativeWorks
UNION ALL
SELECT 'creativeCollaborations', COUNT(*) FROM creativeCollaborations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'creativeInspirationTriggers', COUNT(*) FROM creativeInspirationTriggers
UNION ALL
SELECT 'creativeComments', COUNT(*) FROM creativeComments
UNION ALL
SELECT 'creativeAccessRequests', COUNT(*) FROM creativeAccessRequests;
